pkgmetadata.longdescription: R Templates for Reproducible Data Analyses // A collection of R Markdown templates for nicely structured, reproducible data analyses in R. The templates have embedded examples on how to write citations, footnotes, equations and use colored message boxes, how to cross-reference different parts/sections in the report, provide a nice table of contents (toc) with a References section and proper R session information as well as examples using DT tables and ggplot2 graphs. The bookdown Lite template theme supports code folding.
